description: Plaid. Balanced, plain weave. Brown, tan and pale orange warp and weft.Undetermined warp & weft direction. Sample does not show size of repeat. Machine stitched along ne edge. Stapled inside 8.5 x 11" mat folder. Larsen descriptive label inside. (brown, tan, pale orange)
